text.text_translated: Social media, magazines, and shops show people many things. They show things to buy every day. British people buy many clothes and shoes now. Online shopping makes it easy to buy. People buy things fast. Big shops sell very cheap clothes. People wear these clothes two or three times. Then they throw them away. These clothes are like things for throwing away.
